This fix (2018/01/15) is based on code base of V 11.50,
which fix latexdiff run.

It should work with V 11.50.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To apply the fix just unpack 
http://www.bakoma-tex.com/dist/x1150/fix/latexdiff-fix180115.zip
in BaKoMa TeX folder. 

Check that files 
"BaKoMa\postline.pl"
"BaKoMa\TeXWord\latexdiff.ctr"
have been replaced. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: This fix will be included into version 11.51
